description.ko: 유리를 통과하는 빛의 파편을 정밀하게 포착하여 백색광 안에 숨겨진 활기찬 에너지를 드러냅니다.
description.en: A high-detail capture of light breaking through glass, revealing the vibrant energy hidden within white light.

prompt: An intricate glass polyhedral fractal hit by a concentrated beam of white light, exploding into a web of #FF0080, #00FF80, and #8000FF spectral shards. Intense light dispersion, rainbow caustics, and #FFFF00 chromatic aberration at every crystal facet. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on light splitting into pure energy within a dark void.
